Sally Spriggs

Group Marketing Director, KFC Australia

Sally has over 25 years of Marketing and Advertising experience and in the last 6+ years has been part of the marketing leadership team that has driven sales growth ahead of the category and transformed KFC into a strong and distinctive brand in culture.

Sponsorships and Brand activations have been a key part of this transformation under Sally’s leadership. Including the long standing Cricket Australia partnership, held up as best in class around the world and has seen the KFC “bucketheads” become an entrenched part of Aussie cricket culture. This alongside innovative activations in music and food (like campaigning for a Michelin Star!) have elevated the brand to become an authentic part of pop culture.
